name: Decrypter
description:
DECRYPTER

Decrypto embarks on a breathtaking adventure. On his way, there are locked doors. He must get around platforming challenges including physics based puzzles to collect letters and find the password of each locked door.

This game was created for Boğaziçi Game Jam 2022.

Game developer and designer: Barış Can Sertkaya

Discord: Baris Can#8557

Music:  Let the Games Begin

Decrypter was designed for fullscreen gameplay.
